name: Under the Rain (OLD)
description:
you will be playing as a teenage boy named Kaira. Your Mission is to find The Darya Crystal and Destroy it to break the curse that has fallen onto the land (Full Detailed Story Coming Soon)

I've been working on this game since October 2021. I accidentally deleted the game, and under the rain and other projects are gone. I'm very sorry if this version didn't satisfy you. right now, I'm working on the new version of it. in rpg maker MZ. so please be patient and stay tuned.

- ExternalHyper
